## epiorder


```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(EpiStats)
library(epifield)
library(knitr)

```

## epiorder ill, tira, beer with automatic labels from values
```{r}
data(Tiramisu)
str(Tiramisu)
Tiramisu <- epiorder(Tiramisu, c("ill", "tira", "beer"), values = c(1,0)) %>%
str(Tiramisu)
```

## epiorder ill, tira, beer with YES/NO labels
```{r}
data(Tiramisu)
Tiramisu <- epiorder(Tiramisu, c("ill", "tira", "beer"), values = c(1,0), labels = c("YES", "NO")) %>%
str(Tiramisu)
```


## You can use pipe (%>%) too
```{r}
data(Tiramisu)
Tiramisu %<>% epiorder("ill", values = c(1,0)) %>%
  epiorder(c("tira", "wmousse", "dmousse", "mousse"), values = c(1,0), labels = c("YES", "NO")) %>%
  epiorder(c("beer", "redjelly", "fruitsalad", "tomato"), values = c(1,0), labels = c("YES", "NO")) %>%
  epiorder(c("mince", "salmon", "horseradish", "chickenwin"), values = c(1,0), labels = c("YES", "NO")) %>%
  epiorder(c("roastbeef", "pork"), values = c(1,0), labels = c("YES", "NO"))
str(Tiramisu)
```
